alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 2:51PM CST until February 26 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Hancock and Claiborne Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River above Tazewell TN. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding of pasture land near Grissom Island begins. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by flooding of the Clinch River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 700 AM EST.
